prompt: What are the best free audio to text transcription tools?

hidden_queries: best free audio to text transcription tools
free speech to text transcription software online free audio to text
metadata.generated_search_query: best free audio to text transcription tools

sources.title: The Best Free Audio to Text Converters (2025 Tested)
sources.snippet: Tired of slow, inaccurate transcription? We tested the top 5 free audio to text converters for 2025. Find the best free tools for transcribing MP3s, interviews, lectures, and live speech.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are some of the best free audio-to-text transcription tools you can use now — quick notes on what they do and where they excel: ScreenApp+1
1) Otter.ai – strong all-around choice for transcribing meetings, lectures, and voices. Offers a free tier with a monthly minute limit and editable, searchable transcripts. Otter.ai
2) Google Gemini (free transcription) – allows free transcription of short audio files (up to ~10 min each) with reasonably quick results; useful if you just have occasional clips. Tom's Guide

sources.title: Free Audio to Text Converter - Transcribe Audio Online | AudioToText.com
sources.snippet: Convert audio to text online instantly with our 100% free AI transcription tool. Upload MP3, WAV, or any audio file and get accurate speech-to-text transcripts in minutes.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 3) AudioToText.com – fully free online converter with broad audio format support (MP3, WAV, M4A, etc.) and no signup. Good for quick single-file jobs. AudioToText
4) Speechnotes – simple web-based speech-to-text + voice typing, good for dictation or basic transcription without installs. FreeSpeechText.com
5) Happy Scribe (free plan) – free tier lets you test AI transcription in many languages; solid accuracy and export options. HappyScribe
6) SoundWise.ai – free online speech-to-text with export options (TXT, SRT, etc.) geared toward clipping and replay. Soundwise
7) Scribewave – basic free AI transcription online (no account) but size/uses per day may be limited. Scribewave
8) VOMO.ai – free online audio to text with instant uploads and no downloads needed. Vomo
9) NoScribe.ai – free speech recognition for audio & video with speaker separation and editing. noscribe.ai

sources.title: The Best Free Audio to Text Converters (2025 Tested)
sources.snippet: Tired of slow, inaccurate transcription? We tested the top 5 free audio to text converters for 2025. Find the best free tools for transcribing MP3s, interviews, lectures, and live speech.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Notes / caveats Most “free” tools have limits: file length caps, monthly quotas, or daily usage limits. ScreenApp

sources.title: The 12 Best Free Audio to Text Converter Tools in 2025
sources.snippet: Discover the best free audio to text converter for your needs. We review 12 top tools for transcription, summarization, and captioning with honest pros & cons.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Accuracy varies with audio quality, accents, and noise. AI tools can mis-transcribe unclear speech. If you need offline or developer-level options (like Whisper or APIs), there are completely free open-source ways too — but they require setup. whisperbot.ai
